law.catch_line: In and of itself neither of the following is a defense to or a bar to a divorce:...

text.section:
In and of itself neither of the following is a defense to or a bar to a divorce:
an unaccepted offer of reconciliation by a spouse; or
a rejected attempt at reconciliation by a spouse.

In and of itself neither of the following is a defense to, a bar to, or a ground for a divorce:
the refusal of a spouse to accept an offer of reconciliation made by the other spouse; or
the rejection by a spouse of an attempt at reconciliation made by the other spouse.
